entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
